title: AstroSurvivor
description: A mobile survival action game with auto-shooting mechanics and real-time leaderboards.

title: Critical System Recovery for Traffic Management Center
description: Restored the Traffic Management Center (TMC) systems post-breach, ensuring rapid recovery and increased system uptime.

title: Currently-Watching Plugin
description: A Chrome extension for tracking anime series with drag-and-drop functionality and local storage.

title: Runner
description: A tool that opens Windows applications using Google Assistant through IFTTT integration.

title: CPU Usage Monitor
description: A systray tool that visually monitors CPU usage, changing color based on usage levels.
